children.value: This paper implements MLE polynomial PCS by connecting the PH23 protocol with the FRI protocol. The inner product proof is implemented through Grand Sum. This protocol can also be implemented through Univariate Sumcheck, which will be specifically described in the next article, and compared with this protocol.
[PH23] Papini, Shahar, and Ulrich Haböck. “Improving logarithmic derivative lookups using GKR.” Cryptology ePrint Archive (2023).
[H22] Haböck, Ulrich. “A summary on the FRI low degree test.”
[BCIKS20] Eli Ben-Sasson, Dan Carmon, Yuval Ishai, Swastik Kopparty, and Shubhangi Saraf. Proximity Gaps for Reed–Solomon Codes. In
Proceedings of the 61st Annual IEEE Symposium on Foundations of Computer Science
